verses.verse: This <WH2088> is the book <WH5612> of the generations <WH8435> of Adam. <WH121> In the day <WH3117> when God <WH430> created <WH1254> man, <WH120> He made <WH6213> him in the likeness <WH1823> of God. <WH430>
He created <WH1254> them male <WH2145> and female, <WH5347> and He blessed <WH1288> them and named <WH7121> <WH8034> them Man <WH120> in the day <WH3117> when they were created. <WH1254>

When Adam <WH121> had lived <WH2421> one hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> years, <WH8141> he became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of [a son] in his own likeness, <WH1823> according to his image, <WH6754> and named <WH7121> <WH8034> him Seth. <WH8352>

Then the days <WH3117> of Adam <WH121> after <WH310> he became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Seth <WH8352> were eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967> years, <WH8141> and he had <WH3205> [other] sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
So all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> that Adam <WH121> lived <WH2421> were nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> years, <WH8141> and he died. <WH4191>
And Seth <WH8352> lived <WH2421> one hundred <WH3967> and five <WH2568> years, <WH8141> and became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Enosh. <WH583>

Then Seth <WH8352> lived <WH2421> eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967> and seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> after <WH310> he became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Enosh, <WH583> and he had <WH3205> [other] sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
So all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Seth <WH8352> were nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> and twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> years, <WH8141> and he died. <WH4191>
And Enosh <WH583> lived <WH2421> ninety <WH8673> years, <WH8141> and became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Kenan. <WH7018>

Then Enosh <WH583> lived <WH2421> eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967> and fifteen <WH2568> <WH6240> years <WH8141> after <WH310> he became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Kenan, <WH7018> and he had <WH3205> [other] sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
So all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Enosh <WH583> were nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> and five <WH2568> years, <WH8141> and he died. <WH4191>
And Kenan <WH7018> lived <WH2421> seventy <WH7657> years, <WH8141> and became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Mahalalel. <WH4111>

Then Kenan <WH7018> lived <WH2421> eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967> and forty <WH705> years <WH8141> after <WH310> he became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Mahalalel, <WH4111> and he had <WH3205> [other] sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
So all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Kenan <WH7018> were nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> and ten <WH6235> years, <WH8141> and he died. <WH4191>
And Mahalalel <WH4111> lived <WH2421> sixty-five years, <WH8141> and became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Jared. <WH3382>

Then Mahalalel <WH4111> lived <WH2421> eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141> after <WH310> he became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Jared, <WH3382> and he had <WH3205> [other] sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
So all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Mahalalel <WH4111> were eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967> and ninety-five years, <WH8141> and he died. <WH4191>
And Jared <WH3382> lived <WH2421> one hundred <WH3967> and sixty-two years, <WH8141> and became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Enoch. <WH2585>

Then Jared <WH3382> lived <WH2421> eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> after <WH310> he became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Enoch, <WH2585> and he had <WH3205> [other] sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
So all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Jared <WH3382> were nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> and sixty-two years, <WH8141> and he died. <WH4191>
And Enoch <WH2585> lived <WH2421> sixty-five years, <WH8141> and became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Methuselah. <WH4968>

Then Enoch <WH2585> walked <WH1980> with God <WH430> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> after <WH310> he became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Methuselah, <WH4968> and he had <WH3205> [other] sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
So all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Enoch <WH2585> were three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and sixty-five years. <WH8141>
And Enoch <WH2585> walked <WH1980> with God; <WH430> and he was not, for God <WH430> took <WH3947> him.
And Methuselah <WH4968> lived <WH2421> one hundred <WH3967> and eighty-seven years, <WH8141> and became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Lamech. <WH3929>

Then Methuselah <WH4968> lived <WH2421> seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> and eighty-two years <WH8141> after <WH310> he became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Lamech, <WH3929> and he had <WH3205> [other] sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
So all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Methuselah <WH4968> were nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> and sixty-nine years, <WH8141> and he died. <WH4191>
And Lamech <WH3929> lived <WH2421> one hundred <WH3967> and eighty-two years, <WH8141> and became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of a son. <WH1121>

Now he called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Noah, <WH5146> saying, <WH559> "This <WH2088> one <WH2088> shall give <WH5162> us rest <WH5162> from our work <WH4639> and from the toil <WH6093> of our hands <WH3027> [arising] from the ground <WH127> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> has cursed. <WH779>"

Then Lamech <WH3929> lived <WH2421> five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> and ninety-five years <WH8141> after <WH310> he became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Noah, <WH5146> and he had <WH3205> [other] sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
So all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Lamech <WH3929> were seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> and seventy-seven years, <WH8141> and he died. <WH4191>
And Noah <WH5146> was five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> old, <WH1121> and Noah <WH5146> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Shem, <WH8035> Ham, <WH2526> and Japheth. <WH3315>
